name: MIRROR | ЯOЯЯIM
description:
You are an integral part of the Mirror World, but have been thrown far away from you're home. Try to get back safe and sound using both sides: the normal, and the flipped!

Controls:

  • E to Switch Sides
  • A/D to Move
  • Space(or W) to Jump
  • S to Dive

*Note: The side switching in the WebGL version is a bit glitchy*
